editorialNotes.standard: There’s a new king in town! Upgrade entire realms while battling an evil Dark King in the slick follow-up to Royal Match.

ios.subtitle: From Farming Town to Big City

editorialNotes.standard: We wouldn’t be surprised if Subway Surfers kept its spot near the top of the charts for decades to come. Its heart is the key to its stamina, revealed in loving details lavished on cities from Chicago to Shenzhen in its World Tours or in the lovable ruffians awarded in its frequent events. It’s a cinch to pick up, but we’re still finding new ways to master it years and miles later.

ios.subtitle: Tap tiles in fun music game

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Custom decks, quick matches, and new twists make this smartly designed mobile spin on the beloved card collector a great fit for both newcomers and veterans.

editorialNotes.tagline: No data? No problem! Whether you’re hopping onto a plane or heading off the grid, disconnect with this great game.

ios.subtitle: Build a park, become a tycoon

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Quickly sift through colorful clutter to find identical items in this clever spin on match-3 puzzling.

editorialNotes.tagline: Tons of fun on one screen

ios.subtitle: Play For Fun, Win Real Money

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Tidy your mind by aesthetically arranging stamps, pencils, stationery, and more in this relaxing puzzler.

name: Number Match: 2048 Puzzle
artistName: Loop Games Oyun Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: Collect Em All! Clear the Dots

editorialNotes.standard: Hipster Whale's Apple Design Award–winning game takes a timeless arcade formula—cross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstacles—and transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, you’ll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. There’s a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other games—like Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Road’s wacky world are unmistakable.
editorialNotes.short: These games are tough, but without a challenge, what's the point of ruling leaderboards?

ios.subtitle: Open and stack the new states

editorialNotes.tagline: What goes up, must come down

editorialNotes.standard: Gorgeous real-world scenery, action-packed mini-games, and snappy controls keep us hooked on this beautiful fishing game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Brew and serve espressos, lattes, and other caffeinated concoctions while building a bustling business in this charming coffee shop sim from the makers of Good Pizza, Great Pizza.
This action-packed sequel hits its mark thanks to a quiver full of tweaks, including faster battles, PvP matches, and fantastic new skills to discover.

ios.subtitle: Cat Sorter: Match by Color Fun

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, it’s an experience you’ll happily lose yourself in.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
